name: Warrior
desc: Your father was a skilled fighter...

choices.name: Knight
choices.desc: He was an experienced bodyguard. His skills secured him a place in high society, as he provided his service to the nobility and royalty alike.

choices.name: Royal Guard
choices.desc: Many years of exemplary service made him the captain of Palace Guard. It was then that he met your future mother, a young knight from a poor but noble family.

choices.name: Royal Defender
choices.desc: You've learned much about armor from your parents. The equipment provides additional defense based on its price.

choices.name: Left-Handed
choices.desc: You are left-handed, just like your mother. Items in your left hand (such as shields) is significantly more powerful, but equipment in your right hand (such as weapons) is less efficient.

choices.name: Shield Master
choices.desc: Your mother taught you her fighting style. All shields are a bit more sturdy.

choices.name: Harpy
choices.desc: One day, he was given a task of guarding an ambassador of the Harpies Empire. Unable to move freely around the city due to her status, she gladly accepted him as the main source of entertainment.

choices.name: Hollow Bones
choices.desc: Harpies evolved to have hollow bones making their bodies significantly lighter. It makes you weaker against physical attacks but completely neutralizes any equipment penalties to agility.

choices.name: Effective Metabolism
choices.desc: Harpies digest food much more efficient than most other races. All consumables (and especially food) restore vitality far more effectively.

choices.name: Sky Ward
choices.desc: Harpies use their mystical connection to the sky to fly. You may not be able to do that without wings, but that heritage is still of great help.

choices.name: Assassin
choices.desc: He was a deadly assassin. Even royalties, diplomats and nobility would perish at the tip of his blade, for the right price.

choices.name: Princess
choices.desc: He was instructed to eliminate a princess from another land while visiting their capital on a diplomatic mission. No one has seen her since then. Except you, her son. You were taught how to load and manage people and property.

choices.name: Heavy Knight
choices.desc: Your mother taught you the combat style of Royal Knights, known only to members of the royal families. Defense provided by armor is a bit higher than usual.

choices.name: Fencer
choices.desc: Your mother taught you the fencing style of Royal Knights, known only to members of the royal families. All swords are a bit more powerful than usual.

choices.name: Royal Assassin
choices.desc: Due to your heritage, you got used to the best of equipment. The more expensive your items are, the stronger is their attack.

choices.name: Drow
choices.desc: Carrying out orders, your father often encountered competitors. He'd eliminate them together with the target, but one particularly skilled assassin evaded every one of his deadly strikes. It was your future mother, a lone elf from a distant, underground world.

choices.name: Poison Master
choices.desc: You know a lot about poisons from your mother. Toxins are much less effective against you, and your poison attacks are much stronger.

choices.name: High-Speed Fencer
choices.desc: You learned from your mother about rare combat style used by drow assassins. All daggers are more powerful than usual.

choices.name: Sister Lover
choices.desc: Incest is widespread in drow families, and you know a lot about it from your mother's stories. Characters with the Half-Sister trait will not reject you due to kinship and will have additional disposition bonus.

choices.name: Shooter
choices.desc: He was a skilled marksman. For many years together with other rangers, he hunted monsters and smugglers.

choices.name: Forest Elf
choices.desc: He worked closely together with elven rangers. As time passed, mistrust gave way to friendship and, eventually, to close relationships with one of their ranks.

choices.name: Sniper
choices.desc: Your mother taught you to use bows, as only the Forest Elves can. All bows are more powerful than usual.

choices.name: Elven Farsightedness
choices.desc: Forest elves reliance on ranged weapons reduced their ability to fight in close combat but made them the best ranged weapon users amongst all races. This trait was passed to you from your mother.

choices.name: Elven Ranger
choices.desc: Your mother taught you the ways of elves. Most ranged weapons don't give you penalties to defense.

choices.name: Summer Fay
choices.desc: For eons, Fae race performs the same functions in Forest Courts, unable to change their fate or even to die. Summer Fae embody growth and the emergence of life. Making a child with an occasional mortal is one of the ways to fulfill that destiny.

choices.name: Eternality
choices.desc: Your body inherited some of your mother's unchangeability. You recover half of max-health every day, but all healing items are less efficient.

choices.name: Summer Affinity
choices.desc: You inherited some of your mother's mystical powers. Fire and Light elements are less effective against you and deal more damage to enemies.

choices.name: Life Beacon
choices.desc: Your Fae inheritance gives you the Aura of Life which regenerates some health for you and all characters under your command every day, making them a bit happier.

choices.name: Warrior
choices.desc: He was a famous gladiator. Decades of fighting at the arena made him competent with almost every known weapon and brought fame and wealth.

choices.name: Amazon
choices.desc: It was there that he met your mother, an Amazon from a remote tribe. After defeating her in battle, he took her body instead of taking her life.

choices.name: Yuri Expert
choices.desc: Amazon tribes live without males, so you know a lot about lesbians from your mother's stories. Lesbian characters will not reject you due to your gender, and your oral skill is pretty good too.

choices.name: Muscle
choices.desc: You inherited your mother's strength. Melee weapons deal more damage than usual.

choices.name: Berserk
choices.desc: Your mother taught you her fighting style. All defense bonuses from equipment are lower, but all attack bonuses are higher.

choices.name: Dragon
choices.desc: It was there that he met your mother, one of the last half-dragons. Being a monster, she was supposed to fight him to the death, but her dislike for clothes changed his mind.

choices.name: Fire
choices.desc: Your body is covered with tiny scales. They are almost unnoticeable, but at extreme temperatures they actively absorb and dissipate heat, making fire and, to some extent, electricity less effective.

choices.name: Stone
choices.desc: Your body is covered with tiny scales. They are almost unnoticeable, but upon impact they become as hard as iron, softening the blow (+earth and physical resistance).

choices.name: Dragon Sight
choices.desc: Dragons have perfect vision, and so do you. You are competent with ranged weapons and deal (slightly) increased critical damage.

name: Mage
desc: Your father was a powerful mage.

choices.name: Sorcerer
choices.desc: As a Sorcerer, he dedicated his life to the study of arcane arts.

choices.name: Kitsune
choices.desc: Kitsunes are intelligent beings from a distant land. They possess potent magical abilities that increase as they grow older. Your mother, however, was very young and inexperienced when her clan sent her to study arcane arts under the guidance of your father.

choices.name: Fire Fox
choices.desc: Fire spells heal you instead of hurting, but your Ice spells are almost ineffective.

choices.name: Mana Source
choices.desc: Your magical origins allow you to restore the magical energy of your partners during intimate acts.

choices.name: Magical Kin
choices.desc: Consumables, especially alcoholic beverages, restore much more MP.

choices.name: Winter Fay
choices.desc: Winter Fae are known to be harsh and unyielding, embodying entropy and death in the circle of nature. Therefore the reason behind your birth remains to be discovered.

choices.name: Creature of Ice
choices.desc: Ice spells heal you instead of dealing damage, but your Fire spells are almost useless.

choices.name: Immutability
choices.desc: Your body inherited some of your mother's unchangeability. You restore a third of maximum MP every day. Items that restore it are less effective.

choices.name: Winter Magician
choices.desc: The Winter itself gives you power. You have less MP, but it can never become exhausted.

choices.name: Researcher
choices.desc: As a Researcher, he studied ruins of ancient civilizations in search of forgotten technologies and enchantments.

choices.name: Android
choices.desc: In one of his expeditions, he found an ancient faulty android. He managed to repair and reprogram her to be his 'very' personal assistant.

choices.name: Creature of Electricity
choices.desc: Electricity spells heal you instead of dealing damage, but your Water spells are almost useless. You were left small inheritance by your parents.

choices.name: Looped Physiology
choices.desc: Healing spells don't affect you, but your vitality can never drop to zero.

choices.name: Recharge
choices.desc: Most consumables, even those that don't typically increase MP, restore yours when you consume them.

choices.name: Slime
choices.desc: Pureblood slimes do not feel pleasure in the same way as non-liquid beings, but they are still interested in mating, especially with creatures of potent magic, like your father.

choices.name: Creature of Water
choices.desc: Water spells heal you instead of hurting, but your Electricity spells are almost ineffective.

choices.name: Arcane Archer
choices.desc: Most ranged weapons give a bonus to magic equal to their bonus to attack.

choices.name: Point Resilience
choices.desc: Ranged attacks are ineffective against you, but melee weapons are more dangerous.

choices.name: Arcane Knight
choices.desc: As an Arcane Knight, he specialized in the extermination of dangerous magical creatures who were continually threatening the city.

choices.name: Ghost
choices.desc: While exploring an abandoned temple in an ancient forest, your father found a friendly, lonely spirit of a young priestess. She gladly joined with him, and soon enough they became a family.

choices.name: Intangible
choices.desc: Just as your mother, you are do not entirely belong to the world of the living. All attacks and magic are less effective against you, but your attacks and magic are less efficient as well.

choices.name: Illusive
choices.desc: You exist between the realm of light and darkness. Physical damage is almost ineffective against you, but being ghostly, you can't take girls virginity.

choices.name: Creature of Light
choices.desc: Light spells heal you instead of dealing damage, but your Darkness spells are almost ineffective. You've were left some inheritance.

choices.name: Vampire
choices.desc: For decades he hunted vampires, protecting citizens from these nocturnal predators. One day, while clearing a nest, he captured a vampire queen, but her seductiveness kept her alive and even gave birth to you.

choices.name: Creature of Night
choices.desc: Darkness spells heal you instead of dealing damage, but your Light spells are almost ineffective.

choices.name: Blood Master
choices.desc: Only true vampires have access to blood magic, but your heritage still gives a few perks. Girls who lose their virginity to you, become more obedient.

choices.name: Perfect Reflexes
choices.desc: You inherited your mother's reflexes, which help to evade attacks. Sadly, mortal body is not suitable for vampire speed, affecting your health.
